DOC.brief_summary: This is a retrospective chart review to assess the incidence and the degree of blood pressure changes after induction of anesthesia and to study the effect of different induction agents on blood pressure.
DOC.criteria: Patients between ages of 1 year to 8 years will be included in the study. Patients with ASA physical classification 1 and 2 will be studied. Patients with any cardiovascular or kidney diseases will be excluded from the study.
